question: What are the current technology adoption trends among companies in the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the healthcare industry and gather their core information, including financial metrics and operational details.
Collect technology stack information of the identified healthcare companies to analyze their current technology adoptions.
Analyze the relationships between the identified healthcare companies and their IT service partners to understand collaboration trends.
Review social media engagement metrics of the healthcare companies to assess audience interaction with their technological innovations and trends.
Investigate industry-level trends specific to healthcare to relate them to technology adoption in the sector.
